links.title: Spark Job Excel Download through API
Elasticsearch Cluster Dashboard for all env's
REST API Interface Performance (Export Prometheus/DB Interface)

panels.description: Yellow occurs when any of our service nodes such as ES Cluster/Kafka/Connect/Logstash/Kibana or spark master node goes down. Also all processes in kafka listeners go down or when any task is not running, this metric shows “Yellow” status. If everything is down, the status will be red.
panels.title: Server Active [Dev]

panels.description: Check whether the ‘ES_PIPELINE_UPLOAD_TEST_WM’ process has operated within the last 30 minutes. If it does not work within 30 minutes or doesn't exist it in es_processed_table, you need to check our middleware, etc. For this reason the status will be displayed in red. Otherwise it displays in green.
panels.title: ES Pipeline [Dev]

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: ES Nodes

panels.description: The first node to boot in a Kafka cluster automatically becomes the controller, and there can be only one. The controller in a Kafka cluster is responsible for maintaining the list of partition leaders, and coordinating leadership transitions (in the event a partition leader becomes unavailable). If it becomes necessary to replace the controller, a new controller is randomly chosen by ZooKeeper from the pool of brokers. In general, it is not possible for this value to be greater than one, but you should definitely alert on a value of zero that lasts for more than a short period (< 1s) of time.
panels.title: Kafka Health

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: Kafka Nodes

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: Kafka Connect Nodes

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: Zookeeper Nodes

panels.description: Check If data pipeline process correctly
panels.title: WMx DB : Data Pipeline Process (es_pipeline_processed) - Refresh every 5 mintues (Overall health of the data pipeline)

panels.title: WMx DB : Data Pipeline Process (es_pipeline_processed) - Refresh every 5 mintues (Overall health of the data pipeline)

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: ES Nodes

panels.description: The first node to boot in a Kafka cluster automatically becomes the controller, and there can be only one. The controller in a Kafka cluster is responsible for maintaining the list of partition leaders, and coordinating leadership transitions (in the event a partition leader becomes unavailable). If it becomes necessary to replace the controller, a new controller is randomly chosen by ZooKeeper from the pool of brokers. In general, it is not possible for this value to be greater than one, but you should definitely alert on a value of zero that lasts for more than a short period (< 1s) of time.
panels.title: Kafka Health

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: ES Nodes

panels.description: The first node to boot in a Kafka cluster automatically becomes the controller, and there can be only one. The controller in a Kafka cluster is responsible for maintaining the list of partition leaders, and coordinating leadership transitions (in the event a partition leader becomes unavailable). If it becomes necessary to replace the controller, a new controller is randomly chosen by ZooKeeper from the pool of brokers. In general, it is not possible for this value to be greater than one, but you should definitely alert on a value of zero that lasts for more than a short period (< 1s) of time.
